Summary: Four lights appeared to be in each cornner
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving west on US 40 after sundown I noticed Lights in the sky, Thinkingit was an airplane going to land at Gallup assuming that there was a airportnear. I then noticed that there were no flashing red lights or white strobes,Ikept watching,It had an arrangement of four lights in rectangular formation thelower lights appeared to be at an angle which gave me impression that the objectwas tilted at 45 degrees and was stationary. I couldnt any phyiscal body as itwas a very dark night, overcast as I recall. I did call everyones attention toit but only my son saw it. I would like to know if anyone else saw it.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Gallup
There were no other sightings in Gallup on or around August 6th 2003
